data.enText: the time of life when a person is young, especially the time before a child becomes an adult
data.chText: 青年时期（尤指成年以前）

data.enText: He had been a talented musician in his youth.
data.chText: 他年轻时很有音乐天才。

data.enText: the quality or state of being young
She brings to the job a rare combination of youth and experience.
data.chText: 她很年轻，然而干这份工作已有经验，这是很难得的。

data.enText: The fight was started by a gang of youths.
data.chText: 这场打斗是一伙少年挑起来的。

data.enText: young people considered as a group

means: 青年时期(尤指成年以前)

ex.enText: The street fight was started by a gang of youths.
ex.chText: 这场街头打斗是由一伙少年挑起来的。

ex.enText: There are groups of youths playing basketball over there.
ex.chText: 成群的小伙子正在那里打篮球。

ex.enText: The youth of the country are being ignored by their leaders.
ex.chText: 该国的青年没有受到领导人的重视。

ex.enText: The government calls on the youth to donate their blood voluntarily.
ex.chText: 政府号召青年义务献血。

synonyms.bx: 现在几乎专指年轻的男性，尤用于报纸上，常含贬义。但作为集合名词时，男女青年皆可指，且无贬义。

ex.enText: An adolescent is often caught up in fantastic thoughts.
ex.chText: 青少年常常耽于奇思异想。

ex.enText: His mental capacity never really got beyond that of an adolescent.
ex.chText: 他的智力从未真正超过一个未成年人。

synonyms.bx: 与 teenager 基本同义，但更加正式，强调尚不成熟。

ex.enText: The number of juveniles arrested for violent crimes is increasing.
ex.chText: 因暴力犯罪而被捕的少年犯人数在上升。

ex.enText: The number of juveniles in the general population has fallen.
ex.chText: 总人口中青少年所占比例下降。

synonyms.bx: 常为法律术语，强调未成年的人。

ex.enText: Their band is made up of three cool teenagers.
ex.chText: 他们的乐队由3个帅气的少年组成。

ex.enText: I don't get pimples now, but I did when I was a teenager.
ex.chText: 我现在不会长青春痘，但我在青春期时却没少长。

synonyms.bx: 主要指 13 至 19 岁之间的青少年，强调该年龄段群体的自身特点。

tr: the freshness and vitality characteristic of a young person

example: rock music appeals to the young

tr: a young person (especially a young man or boy)
the state of being young or immature or inexperienced
the time of life between childhood and maturity

example: during the youth of the project

example.ex: In my youth my ambition had been to be an inventor.
example.tran: 我年轻时的抱负是成为一个发明家。
我少年时代看的漫画书

value.def: Someone's youth is the period of their life during which they are a child, before they are a fully mature adult.

example.ex: Gregory was still enchanted with Shannon's youth and joy and beauty...
example.tran: 格雷戈里仍为香农的朝气、快乐和美丽着迷。

example.ex: The team is now a good mixture of experience and youth.
example.tran: 这个队如今既经验丰富又充满朝气。

value.def: Youth is the quality or state of being young.

example.ex: ...gangs of youths who broke windows and looted shops...
example.tran: 打碎玻璃橱窗抢劫商店的成群的年轻人

example.ex: A 17-year-old youth was remanded in custody yesterday.
example.tran: 一名17岁的年轻人昨天被还押候审。

value.def: Journalists often refer to young men as youths, especially when they are reporting that the young men have caused trouble.
value.tran: （新闻用语，尤指惹麻烦的）青年，小伙子

example.ex: He represents the opinions of the youth of today...
example.tran: 他代表着当今年轻人的看法。

example.ex: She's not a very good influence on the youth of this country.
example.tran: 她对这个国家的青年一代没什么好影响。

value.def: The youth are young people considered as a group.

trans: 青年联盟；青年团；共青团；团委；刘畅担任团委
青年招待所，青年旅社(可为旅行的青年人提供廉价食宿)
共青团；共产主义青年团；团员；中国共产主义青年团
青年节；日青年节；五四青年节；青年日；青年節
青年组织；青少年组；青少年群体；青少年团契；青年组
不老泉；青春之泉；青春之源
青年运动；青年运动组织
青年中心；青年厅堂；青年活动中心
